item.title: Configure Visual Studio toolchain on Eclipse
item.description: 1. Install software: Eclipse IDE for C/C++ Developers Visual Studio 2. Open Eclipse -> Help -> Install New Software… -> Work with: http://download.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/releases/9.4/ -> CDT Optional Features -> C/C++ Visual C++ Support 9.4.3.201802261533 -> Next -> Agree -> Install -> Finish -> Restart 3. Close Eclipse 4. Open Developer Command Prompt for VS 2017 and run from it Eclipse (this trick will add all needed VS environment variables to path)
